rooms.Name: The head-control room
rooms.Description:
As you step into this dim-lit room, the door behind you automatically
closes.  A red-light next to this room is flashing as though you have
trigger an alarm of some sort.  There's a man here working hard to maintain
the primary functions on this starship and he seems to be too busy to
notice your presence.  He's dressed in a green armor that looks thicker
than any space suit you've seen.  The man looks like a very intelligent 
person because of how he handles the controls as though he knows
immediately what each button will do.  He doesn't look tough but who knows
what weapons he has in that high-tech battle armor he's wearing.

rooms.Name: The DC booth
rooms.Description:
Welcome to the DC booth at the comic convention.  Standing behind the booth
is a young woman nearly naked.  She is signing autgraphs as she is portraying
some comic heroin.  There is a geek sitting to the right, he has a stained
white t shirt and is loving the young lady.  He looks up to you and says
'Can I help you?'

rooms.Name: Inside a teleporter room
rooms.Description:
You appear out of nowhere in a room you've never seen before!  Everywhere you
look, you can see control panels and flashing lights flickering on and off.
It seems you've been teleported to a starship of some sort or maybe a space
station...but you're not certain.  There are large windows all around the
walls that surround you, and the only things that seem to be out there are
stars, comets, and a large meteor storm.  To your north, there's a door
that'll take you to a hallway.

Exits.Description: Through a glowing portal you can barely make out a forest below.

rooms.Name: Midsection hallway
rooms.Description:
Just seconds after you exit from the teleporter room, the door closes behind
you.  The hallway of this starship looks narrow and unending, and you
hesitate to go further north because you fear what may be living in this
vessel.

rooms.Name: Midsection hallway
rooms.Description:
This narrow hallway comes to end here and there are two new passages you can
take.  To the northwest, there's a hallway that can take you to the western
section of the starship and to the northeast, a different hallway will take
you to the eastern section.

rooms.Name: Western-section hallway
rooms.Description:
This starship looks more like a minature city as you wander through the
labyrinth of hallways from all directions.  To the southwest, the Western-
section hallway continues further on and to your northeast, there's a hallway
that'll take you to the northern-head section of the starship.  The narrow
hallway to your southeast will take you back to the midsection.

rooms.Name: Western-section hallway
rooms.Description:
The long journey from hallway to hallway is beginning to tire you.  You seem
to be going in circles and you're losing your sense of direction.  The
hallway to the western section ends here and to the southwest, you see an
area with beds lined up against the walls.  This must be the resting area for
whomever may be living on this large starship.

rooms.Name: Western-section (rest area)
rooms.Description:
This ship wasn't built for passengers who require 1st class room
accomendations.  This ship was meant to be a battle-cruiser and the
passengers aboard this vessel were soldiers who slept in bunks with other
soldiers.  There are beds everywhere in this section lining the walls all the
way to the west of here.

rooms.Name: Western-section (rest area)
rooms.Description:
Bunks are lined up everywhere and the bedding on top of each bunk are made as
though they have never been slept in.  You're not sure if this entire place
is vacant...the lights are pretty dim in these quarters.

rooms.Name: Western-section (rest area)
rooms.Description:
You sense there is someone or something close by you...and he/it may be just
standing next to you.  The only sound you can hear in this large rest area is
the beat of your heart.  The rest area seems to end west of here and the exit
out of this place is to your east.

rooms.Name: Western-section (rest area)
rooms.Description:
It's pretty dim inside this area of the starship and you wish you could just
make out the shadow of the person who occupies this vessel.  Now you are
definately sure that you're not alone in this room, someone else is here.
There's nowhere to go, the rest area ends here and the exit seems to be miles
from where you're standing...

rooms.Name: Western-section hallway
rooms.Description:
This hallway seems to be reconnected from here and it seems to lead you
further south of the starship.  There's nothing special about this area of
the hallway except you're headed further to a new area of the ship.  The
hallway continues south, and the rest area is to your northwest.

rooms.Name: Western-section hallway
rooms.Description:
The long passageway seems to end here and to your west, there are two large
doors that can take you to a large room.  You wonder what's the purpose for
this large room but you hesitate to go inside.  There must be something
pretty important going on in there, but what?

rooms.Name: Inside a large meeting room
rooms.Description:
This area is unlike the other parts of the starship.  There's actually carpet
that covers every space on the floor and the walls are plastered with elegant
wallpaper.  This must be a room used by high-ranking officers who make
decisions and strategies against their opponents.

rooms.Name: Inside a large meeting room
rooms.Description:
This place is beginning to look more like a first-class hotel except for the
large screen monitors and the numerous control panels that seem to be
everywhere. There is a large round table that must seat at least fifty people
off to the east.

rooms.Name: Inside a large meeting room
rooms.Description:
You are standing before a large round table that spans the entire room.
There are intercom-monitors placed in front of each chair.  This is
definately a place where only the most important passengers come to discuss
important issues and such.

rooms.Name: Inside a large meeting room
rooms.Description:
You're standing before a large-screen monitor which is displaying a global
map of a solar system.  There's a large control panel here that seems to
control something but you aren't sure what.  The meeting room ends here, and
you are disappointed that it didn't lead to another teleporter that can get
you home.

rooms.Name: Eastern-section hallway
rooms.Description:
This narrow passageway seems to lead to the eastern section of this starship.
The hallway stretches all the way southeast of here and to your northwest,
there's a hallway that'll take you to the northern-head section of this
vessel.

rooms.Name: Eastern-section hallway
rooms.Description:
This hallway seems endless but you finally come to an area just southeast of
here.  It seems to be a docking bay of some sort where minature fighter-
ships are sent out for battle, or it could be just a cargo bay for loading
supplies and such.

rooms.Name: Eastern-section hallway
rooms.Description:
So as soon as you walk into this area, you notice a large room just east of
here.  There are fighter planes and minature battle-cruisers here, armed and
ready for takeoff.  This hallway continues northwest and southwest of where
you're standing.

rooms.Name: Eastern-section (the docking bay)
rooms.Description:
You are in awe to see the size of this docking bay...it's huge!  There are
minature fighter-ships all over the place and they don't seem to be crowded
in next to one another due to the unlimited space in this docking bay. You
feel a numbing cold from the freezing temperatures of space as it escapes and
enters the ship from a crack on the entrance/exit gates.

rooms.Name: Eastern-section (the docking bay)
rooms.Description:
The freezing temperature in this room is slowly turning your blood into
frozen yogurt.  You are not suited up to be walking around this area of the
starship and if you go any further east of here, you might be frozen to death
in a matter of minutes.  The docking bay continues east and west of where
you're standing.

rooms.Name: Eastern-section (the docking bay - exit/entrance)
rooms.Description:
You're standing before the large gates that separates you from the void of
space.  Watch Out!  If you open these large gates, you may get sucked out
into the vacuum of outer space.  The freezing temperature of space would
easily kill you, if not, then the lack of oxygen would do the job.

Exits.Description: Only a 'unique' key can open this gate.

rooms.Name: Eastern-section hallway
rooms.Description:
This hallway seems to be endless and the turns from east-to-west and west-
to-east are just confusing.  The hallway continues south and northeast of
where you're standing.

rooms.Name: Eastern-section hallway
rooms.Description:
This hallway seems to take you to the southern part of this starship. There
are some activities going on east of here and you can see lights flashing
from that direction.  The sound of motors and machines seem to be everywhere
in that room east of where you're standing.

rooms.Name: Engineering department
rooms.Description:
There are a lot of activities of all sorts happening inside this large
department.  This must be the area where the ship's power comes from and it
seems to generate that power from that large light capsule south of here.

rooms.Name: Engineering department
rooms.Description:
There's a large light capsule in the middle of the room where the ship
harnesses its seemingly unlimited power.  This engineering room is huge but
there isn't much space to walk because of the wires and the large control
panels that seem to be everywhere.

rooms.Name: Engineering department
rooms.Description:
More and more wires are interconnected from all over the starship.  This area
must be the vital part of the entire vessel and if anything should happen to
this area, it can result in a an explosion or a shutdown of the entire
starship.

rooms.Name: Engineering department
rooms.Description:
You've come to the end of the engineering department and there's nothing
unusual about this room.  There's a large control panel in the middle of the
room and it seems to be automatically operating on the energy flow of this
entire department.  Behind this control panel, you see someone there trying
to operate this system.  He's a big, tall man wearing a tight red spandex
jumpsuit with a lightning symbol in the center.  He doesn't look threatening
but then again, you can't be really sure.

rooms.Name: Northern-head section hallway
rooms.Description:
This passageway inside this strange vessel seems to lead to the northern
section where probably the main controls are located.  This northern hallway
looks endless, maybe you ought to think twice before advancing any
further...it might be a trap.

rooms.Name: Northern-head section hallway
rooms.Description:
The northern passageway seems to end here and you've stopped in front of a
very large room.  To a distance north, you can see super-characters there
wearing outrageous outfits and masks.  They all seem to be busy, manning the
starship and trying to avoid a large meteor storm that is occurring outside
this great vessel.

rooms.Name: Inside the Main Bridge
rooms.Description:
You've stepped into the Main Bridge of this starship and you are in awe to
see everything that surrounds this room.  There are computer panels, flow
charts, diagrams, monitors, etc. on each side of the walls.  There are also
large access panels in the center of this large room and each is operated by
a super-character type.  This area looks safe to go into but WATCH OUT,
things may not be what it seems...advance with caution...

rooms.Name: Inside the Main Bridge
rooms.Description:
There's a large access panel here that is operated by a blonde-haired
super-freak.  He seems to be really busy trying to find the proper controls
that would help this starship to avoid a catastrophe in space.  The guy is
wearing an orange, scaley-type suit and some green spandex pants with fins at
the foot-end.

rooms.Name: Inside the Main Bridge
rooms.Description:
There's someone here behind the large computer panel but you can't seem to
make him out...  He seems to be moving so fast that all you could see of him
is a blur.  For a split second, just when he was taking a breather, he looks
like he's wearing a red bodysuit that covers him from head to toe. He has a
lightning bolt as a symbol in the center of his suit, maybe to symbolize his
awesome, unique power.

rooms.Name: Inside the Main Bridge
rooms.Description:
From this side of the room, you can see all of the super-character type
people here working hard trying to control this alien starship.  You want to
help but they seem to be doing okay and the ship itself is headed almost away
from the meteor storm.  There's a hallway to your northeast, it might take
you to the head controls of this large vessel.

rooms.Name: Inside the Main Bridge
rooms.Description:
You're standing before a large, view-screen monitor which displays a deadly
meteor storm that's happening outside this starship.  The crew on this
bridge is doing a pretty good job at dodging the meteors that are going at
an incredible speed!

rooms.Name: Inside the Main Bridge
rooms.Description:
The spandex-wearing freaks on this ship seem to be really busy just trying
to save themselves from being hit by the meteor storm outside.  You can see
 on the large-screen monitor that meteors, the size of Earth's moon, are just
inches from colliding with this starship.  There's a hallway to your 
northwest which may probably lead you to the head controls of this ship.

rooms.Name: Inside the Main Bridge
rooms.Description:
There's a large computer panel in the center of this section and behind it,
there's a nice-looking brunette in a tight swimsuit adjusting the levers
and controls of this starship.  This woman looks very diligent as she
handles the controls with extreme care.

rooms.Name: Inside the Main Bridge
rooms.Description:
The computer access panel in this section seems to be controlled by two
guys here, both dressed in green outfits and masks.  One of the guys has a
large hunter's bow on his back and he has a blonde goatee and moustache.
The other guy here is a brunette with a small green mask.  He wears a tight
green and black spandex outfit with a strange symbol in the center.

rooms.Name: Inside the Main Bridge
rooms.Description:
This is the center of the Main Bridge and the main controls seem to all be
located here.  Behind these controls, there's a man here trying hard to
navigate the ship to safety and a boy is here, assisting him.  The man looks
like a giant bat.  He wears a dark cowl that covers him like a blanket and
in the center of his outfit is a symbol of the bat.  However, the boy has a
worst taste in costume than anyone else aboard this starship.  He's dressed
in a ballerina-type costume with contrasting colors like red, yellow, and
green all over.

rooms.Name: Northern-section hallway
rooms.Description:
This passageway seems to head towards the head control room of this starship.
The hallway looks safe to walk on but who knows how the security system on
this ship works.  There might be a trap of some sort as you walk further
towards your destination.

rooms.Name: Northern-section hallway
rooms.Description:
You come to the end of this long hallway and there's an entrance here to a
room...probably it's the head control room.  You take a quick, sneak peek at
what's inside that small room.  There's a man inside controlling the access
computer panels and he looks very busy.  You sense there might be danger if
you do step through this entrance...you may never get out...alive!

rooms.Name: Northern-section hallway
rooms.Description:
You sense there is danger around this section of the hallway...that if you
step into that room northwest of here, you may never be able to get out of
there alive!  There's a man in that room northwest of here and he looks
big, very BIG.

rooms.Name: Northern-section hallway
rooms.Description:
The northern passageway probably leads towards the control room of this
starship.  The hallway doesn't seem too long, you can see a room and a man
inside this room from a distance north of here.

rooms.Name: The head-control room
rooms.Description:
As you step into this room, the door behind you quickly closes and you are
locked from the outside.  There's no way you can re-open this door from the
inside and you may be stuck in here till the end of this journey.  The man in
the blue and red spandex suit seems to be too busy to notice your presence.
He's a very big man with big muscles all over.  You sense he's not a
dangerous man but who knows what he's capable of when provoked by pesky fleas
like yourself.  Who knows? -- If he gets mad, he could probably throw you out
the window into the void of space...

rooms.Name: Hurled into the Void of Space!
rooms.Description:
The strength and powers of Superman is too much for you to handle.  With
one powerful, earth-shattering punch, he sends you through the thick steel
wall of this alien vessel.  You gasp for air as you begin to lose
consciousness.  A large comet/meteor is headed towards you and it may hit
at a speed faster than any truck on Earth.
Sorry, young traveler, your journey ends here and now...

rooms.Name: The Void of Space...
rooms.Description:
There's nothing around this area of space except for meteors that are passing
you by at an incredible speed.  You sense danger everywhere as you notice
that you're at the center of a deadly meteor storm.  Watch Out!  One wrong
move around this area, and you may end up getting hit by a meteor...

Exits.Description: You will not survive this deadly meteor shower...
Only a 'unique' key can unlock this gate.
You will not survive this deadly meteor shower...
You will not survive this deadly meteor shower...

rooms.Name: The Void of Space...
rooms.Description:
There's nothing around this area of space except for meteors that are passing
you by at an incredible speed.  You sense danger everywhere as you notice
that you're at the center of a deadly meteor storm.  Watch Out!  One wrong
move around this area, and you may end up getting hit by a meteor...

Exits.Description: You will not survive this deadly meteor shower...
You will not survive this deadly meteor shower...

rooms.Name: The Void of Space...
rooms.Description:
There's nothing around this area of space except for meteors that are passing
you by at an incredible speed.  You sense danger everywhere as you notice
that you're at the center of a deadly meteor storm.  Watch Out!  One wrong
move around this area, and you may end up getting hit by a meteor...

Exits.Description: You will not survive this deadly meteor shower...
You will not survive this deadly meteor shower...

rooms.Name: The Void of Space...
rooms.Description:
A large, round meteor is located here and it's not in motion...someone or
something seems to be riding on top of it.  It looks like one of those
super-characters you would find on Earth but something tells you he's not
from your home-world.  This being looks magnificent and frightening at the
same time.  With pointy ears and a dark, evil face, he stares and laughs at
you as though he is about to do something WICKED!

Exits.Description: You will not survive this deadly meteor shower...
You will not survive this deadly meteor shower...
You will not survive this deadly meteor shower...

rooms.Name: The Void of Space...
rooms.Description:
You should have never stepped into this place.  No mortal should ever witness
two of the greatest, most powerful beings in the universe challenging one
another for the fate of REALITY!  You're standing before two celestial beings
that are about to engage in a combat that would shatter worlds light-years
away.  At this moment, they seem to be discussing time barriers, alternate
universes, and such things that are beyond any human comprehension. This
would be a good time for you to leave before their grand battle starts...

Exits.Description: You will not survive this deadly meteor shower...
You will not survive this deadly meteor shower...
You will not survive this deadly meteor shower...
You will not survive this deadly meteor shower...
You will not survive this deadly meteor shower...
You will not survive this deadly meteor shower...
You will not survive this deadly meteor shower...

rooms.Name: The Void of Space...
rooms.Description:
There's nothing around this area of space except for meteors that are passing
you by at an incredible speed.  You sense danger everywhere as you notice
that you're at the center of a deadly meteor storm.  Watch Out!  One wrong
move around this area, and you may end up getting hit by a meteor...

Exits.Description: You will not survive this deadly meteor shower...
You will not survive this deadly meteor shower...

rooms.Name: The Void of Space...
rooms.Description:
Meteors and more meteors are passing you by at an incredible speed and it's
becoming more difficult to dodge them as you continue your long journey. You
notice a man coming close to your direction.  He doesn't look hostile and
maybe he's just trying to help you out of this stellar deathtrap.  But can
you trust a green-skinned, bald-headed man who's wearing nothing but blue
underwear and cape?

Exits.Description: You will not survive this deadly meteor shower...
You will not survive this deadly meteor shower...

rooms.Name: The Void of Space...
rooms.Description:
There's nothing around this area of space except for meteors that are
passing you by at an incredible speed.  You sense danger everywhere as you
notice that you're at the center of a deadly meteor storm.  Watch Out!  One
wrong move around this area, and you may end up getting hit by a meteor...

Exits.Description: You will not survive this deadly meteor shower...
You will not survive this deadly meteor shower...

rooms.Name: The Void of Space...
rooms.Description:
OH MY GOD...THE PAIN!!! You were careless to have stepped into the path of a
super-meteor and the impact is so painful that not even your powerful armor
could save you.  You can feel the intense heat of this rock as it sears your
skin, charring it to the BONE!  The torture doesn't end there...the meteor
seems to be dragging you along on its journey and before you could close your
eyes, you notice you're about to be slammed into another meteor!!  Sorry,
young space-traveler, your journey ends here and now...

rooms.Name: The Void of Space...
rooms.Description:
There's nothing around this area of space except for meteors that are passing
you by at an incredible speed.  You sense danger everywhere as you notice
that you're at the center of a deadly meteor storm.  Watch Out!  One wrong
move around this area, and you may end up getting hit by a meteor...

Exits.Description: You will not survive this deadly meteor shower...
You will not survive this deadly meteor shower...

rooms.Name: The Void of Space...
rooms.Description:
There's nothing around this area of space except for meteors that are passing
you by at an incredible speed.  You sense danger everywhere as you notice
that you're at the center of a deadly meteor storm.  Watch Out!  One wrong
move around this area, and you may end up getting hit by a meteor...

Exits.Description: You will not survive this deadly meteor shower...
You will not survive this deadly meteor shower...
You will not survive this deadly meteor shower...

rooms.Name: The Void of Space...
rooms.Description:
Dodging through this meteor storm is becoming more difficult as you advance
closer to your destination, wherever that may be...  Suddenly, you notice a
man on a motorcylce-like space cruiser coming towards your direction.  He
doesn't look like a nice guy...in fact he's about to run you over...either
because you're in his way or he's a homicidal maniac who enjoys watching
people DIE and SUFFER!

Exits.Description: You will not survive this deadly meteor shower...
You will not survive this deadly meteor shower...
You will not survive this deadly meteor shower...

rooms.Name: The Void of Space...
rooms.Description:
There's nothing around this area of space except for meteors that are passing
you by at an incredible speed.  You sense danger everywhere as you notice
that you're at the center of a deadly meteor storm.  Watch Out!  One wrong
move around this area, and you may end up getting hit by a meteor...

Exits.Description: You will not survive this deadly meteor shower...
You will not survive this deadly meteor shower...

rooms.Name: The Void of Space...
rooms.Description:
At a distance from where you're standing, you can see a small, lovely blue
planet.  You wanted to go there for a visit but there are two super-beings
here preventing anyone from disturbing the planet's serenity.  One of them is
wearing a green vest with oversized boots and the other is a smaller
gentleman with blue skin.  Both of them seem to be talking before you wander
to this area, and they don't seem happy about your presence here. The two
beings don't look hostile but if you try anything funny, they could really
mess you up.

Exits.Description: You will not survive this deadly meteor shower...
You will not survive this deadly meteor shower...
You will not survive this deadly meteor shower...

rooms.Name: In the Castle of Apokolips
rooms.Description:
The grand castle of this large and populated planet looks nothing like you've
seen before.  The alien technology is unimaginable and the construction and
the architecture is just awe-inspiring.  This castle is made of solid metal
of unknown composition and it looks sturdy enough to withstand an attack even
from a galactic armada.

rooms.Name: In the Castle of Apokolips
rooms.Description:
As soon as you enter this area of this ancient castle, you notice a man in an
iron mask is standing before you.  He seems to be the protector of this
castle and what he seems to be trying to prevent you from going any further
north of here and into the throne room.  He does look like a pretty tough
guy, maybe you should think about turning back right now... To the north, a
throne room of this castle's master is located there. PROCEED WITH CAUTION,
for the Lord Darkseid is one of the most powerful and cunning beings in this
entire universe!

Exits.Description:
There's an large metal door in front of you and it seems to be locked. You'll
need a key to open this barrier if you wish to go any further.

rooms.Name: The Throne Room of Lord Darkseid
rooms.Description:
Just as soon as you enter this majestic room, the door behind you closes all
of a sudden!  You have nowhere to go...either challenge the great Darkseid in
mortal combat or DIE!  As you look around, the center platform you're
standing on begins to rise quickly.  You look over the edge to see what's
below and you gasp in fear...large bone-grinding blades are placed there to
dispose of fools who think they can defeat a GOD.  On the throne, Darkseid
looks at you and laughs out loud.  You can feel the power that surrounds this
mighty tyrant, and he seems to be ready to ANNIHILATE you with his SUPREME
deathblows!

rooms.Name: Falling into the BONE-GRINDING BLADES!
rooms.Description:
This is not a pretty sight...  Pieces of flesh and bones are splattered
with blood all over the place.  You can hear the clashing blades as it
devour your body with ease, and your screams of agony echo throughout this
room as Darkseid laughs with amusement!  You begin to choke on your own
blood as you struggle in pain to free yourself from this grisly deathtrap!
Sorry, young space-traveler, your long journey has finally come to an end.

rooms.Name: The Void of Space...
rooms.Description:
There's nothing around this area of space except for meteors that are passing
you by at an incredible speed.  You sense danger everywhere as you notice
that you're at the center of a deadly meteor storm.  Watch Out!  One wrong
move around this area, and you may end up getting hit by a meteor...

Exits.Description: You will not survive this deadly meteor shower...

rooms.Name: The Void of Space...
rooms.Description:
There's nothing around this area of space except for meteors that are passing
you by at an incredible speed.  You sense danger everywhere as you notice
that you're at the center of a deadly meteor storm.  Watch Out!  One wrong
move around this area, and you may end up getting hit by a meteor...

Exits.Description: You will not survive this deadly meteor shower...
Only an 'unique' key can unlock these gates.
You will not survive this deadly meteor shower...

rooms.Name: Western-section (the docking bay - exit/entrance)
rooms.Description:
You're standing before a strong gate that separates you from the freezing
cold of outer space.  The docking bay seems to end here with this large exit
where these minature battle-cruisers takeoff to assist in battle.  The tall
gate looks like a tough barrier, it's probably more than a few feet thick and
made from an indestructable metal.

Exits.Description: Only a 'unique' key can unlock this gate.

rooms.Name: Western-section (the docking bay)
rooms.Description:
There are a lot of minature battle-cruisers lined up all over this entire
room. It looks as though the old occupants of this starship were preparing
for some sort of a battle to the death.  Each small ship is equipped with a
supply of unlimited ammunition and some anti-aircraft guns on its wings.

rooms.Name: Western-section (the docking bay)
rooms.Description:
You've entered the docking bay of this large starship and you are in awe to
see what's inside.  There are hundreds, maybe thousands of minature battle-
cruisers everywhere you look.  There's a long stretch of runway in the center
of this docking bay that seems to lead towards a large gate.

rooms.Name: Western-section hallway
rooms.Description:
This section of the passageway ends here and you notice there are two
entrances here that you can take.  To your northwest, there's a large docking
bay that's ready to send out battle-cruisers into a galactic war. To your
east, the mid-section hallway begins there.

rooms.Name: Midsection hallway
rooms.Description:
This short but narrow passageway seems to lead toward the middle of this
large vessel, probably towards the main bridge.  The diagrams on the walls
show that the main controls seem to be located at that direction.  This
hallway continues east of here.

rooms.Name: Midsection hallway
rooms.Description:
This hallway ends here all of a sudden but you'll notice a large meeting room
to your northeast.  There's a large table in the middle of the room with
chairs set all around it.  You can see charts and maps of different solar
systems and a view screen that's monitoring the conditions outside this
mammoth starship.

rooms.Name: Western-section hallway
rooms.Description:
The small windows on the sides of this hallway show a large meteor storm just
right outside this starship.  Some of those meteors are just inches from
colliding with this mammoth vessel.  The passageway continues northwest and
southeast of here.

rooms.Name: Western-section hallway
rooms.Description:
You are getting tired from all this walking.  This hallway seems endless from
where you are currently located.  In both directions, there are more and more
hallways everywhere.  This narrow passageway continues northwest and
southeast of where you're standing.

rooms.Name: Western-section hallway
rooms.Description:
As you walk along this passageway, you notice the diagrams and maps on the
walls.  Everywhere you look, there are computerized charts displaying
locations and the current status of the starship.  The long passageway
continues northwest of here and the teleport room is to your southeast.

rooms.Name: Inside a teleporter room
rooms.Description:
You appear out of nowhere in a room that you're not familiar with. Everywhere
you look, there are computerize diagrams and panels that cover all the walls.
You see a large control console in the middle of the room and it looks like
it controls this entire place.  There are hundreds of wires all over the
floor that are connecting one thing to another.  Two exits are located in
this room, one to your northwest and the other, northeast of here.

rooms.Name: Eastern-section hallway
rooms.Description:
This passageway will take you to the east section of this vessel and it looks
endless.  The hallway stretches all the way northeast of here...as far as the
eye can see.  The only thing that's different about this section of the
hallway is the schematic charts on the sides of the walls.

rooms.Name: Eastern-section hallway
rooms.Description:
The long and narrow passageway seems to be continuous and the end doesn't
seem to be anywhere near your location.  You are beginning to tire from this
long walk on this endless hallway.  It would be wise for you to think about
turning back right now.

rooms.Name: Eastern-section hallway
rooms.Description:
Everywhere you look, it seems like the passageway here isn't going to end
anytime soon.  You're about to give up this long journey and turn back to the
teleporter room.  This long and narrow hallway continues northeast and
southwest of where you're standing.

rooms.Name: Eastern-section hallway
rooms.Description:
Finally, it looks like you've come to the end of this long hallway.  There
are new passageways that you can take here.  To your northeast, a room is
located there...it looks like the engineering room of this starship but
you're not sure.  To your west, another section of the hallway begins...it
looks like it will lead you towards the midsection of the vessel.

rooms.Name: Midsection hallway
rooms.Description:
This short passageway looks like it leads towards the middle of the vessel,
possibly towards the main bridge.  You can see from a distance that this
hallway is about to end soon as you begin walking further west of here.

rooms.Name: Midsection hallway
rooms.Description:
It looks like this short hallway ends here.  There's a large room northwest
of where you're standing and you are in awe to see all the monitors,
diagrams, maps, etc. on all the walls and computer consoles.  There's a large
table in the center of this room and chairs are lined to the sides of it.
That room must be some sort of a meeting place for the crew of this great
starship.

rooms.Name: Engineering room
rooms.Description:
Everywhere you look, there are gadgets and computers making noises all around
this huge room.  This must be the engineering room where the ship recieves
and regenerates its power supply.  This is a very well-lit room, the lights
on the power cells are so bright, it could almost make you blind when you
look at it.

rooms.Name: Engineering room
rooms.Description:
The power cells in this room seem to be everywhere you look.  This starship
must require a massive dosage of energy in order for it to function.  The
cells are making the room so bright that you have to shield your eyes from
being blinded.  The engineering room ends just east of here.

rooms.Name: Engineering room
rooms.Description:
The main power conduits are all located in this one section of the room.  A
large power capsule lies in the middle of this room as cables are connected
there to send the energy to different areas of the ship.  There's a man here
dressed in some eskimo outfit and he looks like he's controlling this part of
the vessel.

rooms.Name: Inside a meeting room
rooms.Description:
What a large room you've entered!  The walls are filled with diagrams and
maps of everything in this section of the galaxy.  To the further west of
here, there's a large table where the actual meeting of the crew takes place.
There's a big guy sitting on a chair motionless as though he's dead.  Maybe
you shouldn't disturb his rest...

rooms.Name: Inside a meeting room
rooms.Description:
You're standing before a large table where important discussions are talked
over by the members of this starship's crew.  There are chairs and small
monitors hooked up to each section of the table.  A giant with bone-white
skin is sitting here, looking as though he's been dead for a year.  Watch
out!  Getting him mad may not be the wisest thing to do.

rooms.Name: Inside a meeting room
rooms.Description:
This room is probably the largest room in this entire ship and it looks like
it's a meeting room of some sort.  There's a large table, east of here, and
chairs are lined all around it.  Monitors and schematic charts are everywhere
on the walls and control consoles.  A man with a fish tank for a helmet seems
to be controlling this section of the room.  He's configuring some data on
the main control panel.

rooms.Name: Inside a meeting room
rooms.Description:
As soon as you walk into this section of the meeting room, a strange laughter
seems to echo everywhere.  A little elf is here, floating on mid- air in a
sitting position!  He's a skinny little man about fifty or sixty years old
and his large, round head is unlike any human on earth.  This little elf
looks harmless but you sense he's more dangerous than he looks.

rooms.Name: Inside a meeting room
rooms.Description:
There's more and more diagrams and systematic charts on the walls.  The
view-screen in the center of this room shows the turbulence that's happening
outside this starship.  This vessel is trying to pass through a thick meteor
storm and it's incredible that this ship could survive this long in this
disastrous conditions.

rooms.Name: Inside a meeting room
rooms.Description:
A large view-screen monitor is located here where everyone on the meeting
table can see.  It shows the terrible conditions outside this area of space
and it's incredible that not even one meteor has struck this sturdy vessel.
There's another hallway behind the large monitor.  It seems to lead towards
another large room north of here, it's probably the main bridge of this
starship or its head control room.

rooms.Name: Northern-section hallway
rooms.Description:
This short and broad passageway may probably take you to the main bridge of
this starship.  To the north, you can see a room as large as the meeting room
you've come from.  There seems to be a lot of activities going on in that
area and you can see people there scampering all around.

rooms.Name: Northern-section hallway
rooms.Description:
You've come to the end of this short passageway.  To the north of where
you're standing, you would notice a large room where all the main controls
are located.  There are people there stationed to their post and working to
keep this ship from being hit by the meteors outside.

rooms.Name: Inside the Main Bridge
rooms.Description:
You are astonished by the setup in this room.  There are control consoles
everywhere you look and monitors and view-screens in all directions.  The
crew on this main bridge seems to be working feverishly as they try to
manuever the ship out of danger from the deadly meteor storm outside.

rooms.Name: Inside the Main Bridge
rooms.Description:
A large control console is lying in the middle of this section and a funny-
looking man in a top-hat is here, trying hard to understand the different
controls and functions.  He looks like a penguin with his long beaked nose
and his black and white tuxedo.  When he moves, he waddles like a penguin
and even squawks like one.

rooms.Name: Inside the Main Bridge
rooms.Description:
The first thing you notice when coming to this section of the main bridge,
is the woman behind the control panel.  She's dressed in leather from head
to toe and her outfit is skin-tight.  The outfit she's wearing makes her
look like a black cat because of her long tail and her pointy cat's ears.
Her attention seems to be towards the panel as she tries to find the
correct levers to pull and the correct buttons to push.

rooms.Name: Inside the Main Bridge
rooms.Description:
The control console here looks like it's about to explode and it seems to
be hammered by a bat or something.  A large man is here, trying hard to
control the complicated functions on this panel and he looks very frustrated.
In fact, as he push each button on the panel, he's really pounding it with
his great strength.  This man possess superhuman strength and the costume
he's wearing looks like the outfit worn by Superman...

rooms.Name: Inside the Main Bridge
rooms.Description:
You're standing before a large screen monitor and it looks like it is
showing the conditions outside this starship.  The deadly meteor storm is
becoming more and more dangerous as the ship heads toward the center of the
storm's pathway.  A man is here laughing out loud as though he is amused by
the life and death situation that he's about to face.  He looks like a
circus clown because of the makeup on his face and his colorful outfit.
Behind teh large screen monitor is a pathway that'll take you north of this
starship...it might lead you towards the head control room.

rooms.Name: Inside the Main Bridge
rooms.Description:
The control console here seems to be managed by a lunatic who's talking to
himself constantly.  He wears a small green mask and a green jumpsuit with
question marks all over.  The lunatic chuckles as he works on the control
panel...he seems to be always thinking about something.  He's probably
thinking up of a way to kill someone or maybe a diabolical plot to takeover
the entire world.

rooms.Name: Northern-head section hallway
rooms.Description:
This short and narrow hallway seems to lead you towards the head-control
room where the navigation controls are located.  The room, north of here,
looks dark but you can see the lights inside flickering on and off.
There's a man in that small room and he seems to be working hard to keep
this starship under control.  Watch Out!  Once you pass through into that
room, the security system in this vessel may be activitated immediately and
you may find yourself at the mercy of this bloodthirsty crew.

rooms.Name: A transporter back to earth
rooms.Description:
You are standing in a glass room with doors to each side of you.  Bellow you
is a handle on the floor.  There is plenty of room for you to pull the plug
and not hit your behind on the walls.  There are lights on periodic sections
everywhere.  You realize that there is no way back out of this place.

rooms.Name: Welcome to Metro-Gotham City!
rooms.Description:
***********************************************************    **
Welcome to...                                    **    **
**    **            M E T R O - G O T H A M   C I T Y          **
*********************************************************** You are amazed
and bedazzled by this city's unique atmosphere and the buildings that are
towering everywhere.  There are people walking here and there ... it's like
Tokyo Main Street during business hours.  The noise level in this city is so
loud that your ear drums feel like it's about to burst.  But it's not the
people nor the noise that makes this city so different from New York or any
other metropolitan area, it's the super- beings that are roaming freely here.
Some of these superbeings look dangerous and others look majestic in their
pose as they fly over this futuristic city. There's a small sign posted here.
(GLOWING)

ExtraDescs.Description:
In the year 1998, a devasting earthquake rocked the continent of North
America.  Hundreds of millions died and all of the cities were in ruins.
Looters, scavengers, and murderers were left free to do whatever they wished
and there were no one to stop them.  The US government was losing control
over its armies as they were tempted themselves to start raping cities for
food and other valuables.  The situation became so bad that the superheroes
planned a truce with their super-nemesis to help rebuild America and to
restore a new government controlled by both parties.  It was an unlikely
alliance but amazingly the plan worked out well.  Metro-Gotham is now the
largest city in the world, covering almost half of North America.  The name
'Metro-Gotham' was given to this city in honor of the two great cities,
Metropolis and Gotham, which were destroyed instantly by the earthquake.

rooms.Name: The Metro-Gotham Subway Transit
rooms.Description:
The subway system of this large city is very complex and it'll take some time
before you'll be able to find your way around.  There's a marble stairway
ahead of where you're standing and from here, you can see vacationers and
businessmen/women pacing quickly down the steps trying to catch the earliest
train.  You can hear the loud speakers as the ticketeer announce the
destination routes and arrival times.

rooms.Name: Metro-Gotham Subway Station
rooms.Description:
Like most subway systems in a metropolitan area, this station is dimly lit.
It's so crowded in here that you're beginning to sweat profusely.  Everyone
is lining up to get onto the next train and they all seem to be very anxious
as one person pushes another.  There's no place to breathe in here and you
find it difficult to even move an inch on the walkway.

rooms.Name: Wandering in the Metro-Gotham Subway Station
rooms.Description:
This is hell.  You've been pushing and shoving for the last hour and you
don't seem to be moving to anywhere fast.  The dim lighting of this subway
station doesn't help you very much either.  The sunlight from the other side
of this Metro station seems to be your only hope of finding your way out of
here.  You better hurry...the next train is about to arrive and you don't
want to be a victim of a stampede.

rooms.Name: Somewhere in the Metro-Gotham Subway Station
rooms.Description:
This tunnel is longer than it looks and you're beginning to tire from this
long walk.  There are still people all around you, pushing and screaming
profanities at you.  But you don't seem to be bothered by them...all you want
to do now, is just get out of here and get into Metro-Gotham City.

rooms.Name: Inside the Metro-Gotham Subway Station
rooms.Description:
This subway station is a hell pit.  It's so hot in here that you're gasping
for air as you walk every step in this station.  There's a light to the north
of where you're standing and YES, it is the exit out of this tunnel. The
entrance to the south will take you into the super city, Metro-Gotham.

rooms.Name: Exitting the Metro-Gotham Subway Station
rooms.Description:
This exit from the other side of the subway station will take you straight
into the grand city of Metro-Gotham, home of the GREATEST SUPERHEROES the
world has ever seen.  There are many happy vacationers here hoping to enjoy
the splendid scenaries this city has to offer, and maybe they can even get to
meet some of the local celebrities, Batman, Superman, and even Lex Luthor or
the Joker.

rooms.Name: Inside the Futuristic City of Metro-Gotham
rooms.Description:
This city is much more beautiful than you dreamed it would be.  The
futuristic design of the buildings and monuments are just stunning.  You are
in awe to see the anti-gravity automobiles passing you by and the tall, arch
mid-air highways that they're moving on.

rooms.Name: Metro-Gotham Main Street
rooms.Description:
You're standing on the most popular street in Metro-Gotham.  This long road
can take you to almost all of the interesting sites you would want to visit
for your journey here.  Metro-Gotham Main Street stretches all the way to the
north of here, and to the east, there's an intersecting road that'll take you
somewhere else.

rooms.Name: Golden Age Avenue
rooms.Description:
The pavement on this road looks to be made of solid granite with gold
spreckles all over it.  This long stretch of road seems to lead to
something important, probably to some rich-men's district.  There are palm
trees and well-trimmed bushes everywhere on the side of this street and
unlike the Metro-Gotham Main Street, this road is less crowded with 
vacationers and businessmen/women.

rooms.Name: Walking on Golden Age Avenue
rooms.Description:
This road stretches all the way east of here and it doesn't look like it'll
end anytime soon.  The scenaries of this long walk is just breathtaking.
You can smell the freshly mowed lawn and the lovely sunset that shines in
the glistening pond on a vast golf course.

rooms.Name: Walking on Golden Age Avenue
rooms.Description:
The houses here look pretty high class and the cars that drive by this road
look pretty damn classy.  Even the nearby residents look like they're rolling
in the big bucks, wearing designer's labels and flashing their Rolexes and
their sapphire rings.  This district must be the playground of the rich and
famous.  Only a selected few of the Metro-Gotham elite are allow to live in
such a lavish lifestyle.

rooms.Name: Walking on Golden Age Avenue
rooms.Description:
This lovely stretch of road seems to end here, but it actually continues 
to the southeast where it probably leads to some multi-million-dollar
estates.  There's another intersecting road, north of here, that is 
connected to this one.  Unlike this roadway, that street looks more like 
the rest of Metro-Gotham, a street where 'commoners' walk on.

rooms.Name: Old Metropolis Road
rooms.Description:
This short and narrow road is dedicated to the 'ancient' city of Metropolis,
home of the greatest hero ever...Superman!  Though this street is not as
well-maintained as the previous road you came from, this road is still one of
the best tourist attractions.

rooms.Name: Old Metropolis Road
rooms.Description:
You are standing before the most infamous newspaper publisher of all
time...the Daily Planet.  Though the first building was crushed in the Big
Quake, it was Superman who personally gathered the raw materials to
reconstruct this skyscraper to its original state.  Since then, the Daily
Planet has become the biggest tourist attraction in this city.  There's a
revolving glass door that'll take you inside this building.

Exits.Description: This revolving glass door will take you inside the Daily Planet.

rooms.Name: The Void of Space...
rooms.Description:
There's nothing around this area of space except for the meteors that are
passing you at an incredible speed.  You sense danger everywhere as you
notice that you're at the center of a deadly meteor storm.  Watch Out!  One
wrong move around this area, and you may end up getting hit by a meteor...

rooms.Name: The Void of Space...
rooms.Description:
There's nothing around this area of space except for the meteors that are
passing you at an incredible speed.  You sense danger everywhere as you
notice that you're at the center of a deadly meteor storm.  Watch Out!  One
wrong move around this area, and you may end up getting hit by a meteor...

rooms.Name: A Black Hole...!
rooms.Description:
AAAAAAAARRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRGGGGGGGGGGGHHHHHHHHHH!!!!!  THE PAIN!!!! The
force of the Black Hole rocks you back and forth...you are in pain as the
pressure inside this area pounds your head!  Blood begins to flow down from
your nose and you begin to lose consciousness.  As you look around inside
this massive darkness, you'll notice that there seems to be no way out of
here.  You cry out for help but the void of space muffles any sounds that you
make...  Sorry, young traveler, entering this area of space may be the
biggest mistake you have ever made!

rooms.Name: A Black Hole...!
rooms.Description:
Hmmm, how odd...this area of the Black Hole seems to be much more calmer and
the pressure in here seems to be nonpresent.  At a distance south of here,
you'll notice the clam area of this Black Hole continues there.

rooms.Name: A Black Hole...!
rooms.Description:
Just as you enter this area of the Black Hole, a monster -- the size of 5
normal men -- is here, standing before you with closed fist.  Parts of his
massive body are covered in stone and his knuckles are studded with razor-
sharp edges.  His eyes are bloody red as though they are filled with rage and
anger for vengeance!  Don't get too close to him...if you annoy him, he can
hurl you back to the turbulence of the outer section of this Black Hole!

rooms.Name: A Black Hole...!
rooms.Description:
AAAAAAAARRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRGGGGGGGGGGGHHHHHHHHHH!!!!!  THE PAIN!!!!

The force of the Black Hole rocks you back and forth...you are in pain
as the pressure inside this area pounds your head!  Blood begins to flow
down from your nose and you begin to lose consciousness.  As you look 
around inside this massive darkness, you'll notice that there seems to be
no way out of here.  You cry out for help but the void of space muffles any
sounds that you make...  Sorry, young traveler, entering this area of space
may be the biggest mistake you have ever made!

rooms.Name: The Front Garden of Wayne Manor
rooms.Description:
The mansion in front of you is just incredible.  It must be hundreds of years
old and yet it looks so well-kept.  The owners of this large mansion must
have spent millions on maintenance and repair.  As you step closer to the
large mansion doors, you'll notice a lovely decorative fountain.  The mansion
doors are located east of where you're standing.

Exits.Description: Behind this door is Wayne Manor!

rooms.Name: Inside Wayne Manor
rooms.Description:
You are now inside the mansion of one of the world's most richest men.  As
you step inside this room, you are in awe to see so many Picassos, Monets,
and various other valuable paintings hanging on the wall as though they serve
as wallpaper.  The insides of this magnificent structure is as beautiful as
its outsides and you are curious to go from room to room to study its
historical architecture.

Exits.Description: This is the exit out of Wayne Manor!

rooms.Name: The Main Hallway Inside Wayne Manor
rooms.Description:
This entire mansion is like a grand museum.  There are valuable paintings
hanging from wall to wall and ancient artifacts displayed on each side of the
aisle.  Bruce Wayne must have spent a fortune buying all these treasures just
so he can enjoy them for himself.  The main hallway continues north and south
of here.

rooms.Name: End of the Main Hallway Inside Wayne Manor
rooms.Description:
You can never get tired of exploring this mansion.  It seems like at every
corner of this structure there is a painting or an artifact lying there. You
have finally come to the end of the main hallway and you noticed that it took
you to the den where Bruce Wayne and his young ward, Dick Grayson, spend
their time reading books.

rooms.Name: The Den Inside Wayne Manor
rooms.Description:
There are shelves and shelves of books everywhere you look!  You are amazed
by the size of this den, it looks much larger than the local library that you
go to.  The books on each shelves are all original prints and are leather
bounded to keep from deterioration.  You wish you had the time to go look
through each shelf to find your favorite book but you know that Alfred the
butler wants you out as soon as you are done with your touring.

rooms.Name: The Den Inside Wayne Manor
rooms.Description:
Books and more books are stacked neatly on the hardwood shelves.  There must
be hundreds of thousands of books in this entire den alone.  As you walk
further inside this den, you'll notice a warm fireplace is located to the end
of here.  There are a couple of 'lazy boys' beside the fireplace where Bruce
Wayne and his young friend, Dick Grayson, would sit down to relax and read a
good book.  As you head towards those chairs to lie down, you'll notice a
book shelf to the south of here.  There seems to be a light coming from
behind it...could it be a secret passage?

Exits.Description:
You take a closer look at this shelf and you notice that there is INDEED a
secret entrance behind...where will it take you?  You'll have to find out for
yourself!

rooms.Name: A Secret Passageway...
rooms.Description:
You hesitate for a second before you start walking inside this dark, secret
passageway.  You don't know what could be lurking ahead and you're not sure
you even want to find out.  However your cowardice has been overcome by your
greed...the thought of a hidden treasure inside this two-hundred year  old
mansion makes you the bravest of men.  As you continue your walk inside this
tunnel, you'll notice that bats high above you are making a loud shrieking
noise as though they are trying to warn someone of your presence.

Exits.Description:
This exit will take you out of this secret passage and back into the den at
Wayne Manor.

rooms.Name: Walking Down the Secret Passageway
rooms.Description:
It's dark...very DARK and you're stumbling along this pathway like a blindman
trying to walk across a street.  You're beginning to get tired as the
passageway seems to be endless.  This dank passageway is beginning to widen
up as you continue walking further downwards.

rooms.Name: A Secret Entrance to the Batcave
rooms.Description:
Holy Torpedoes, Mudder!  You just found the secret Batcave...the legendary
hideout and the info-center of Batman!  So if the Batcave is located under
the Wayne Mansion, what's the connection between Bruce Wayne and the
mysterious vigilante?...guess you'll never know...  A tall, steel door from
the south of here is blocking your way into the Batcave.

Exits.Description:
This thick steel door is enough to keep out even the strongest of men.  Don't
even try open it, wimp! ;)

rooms.Name: Inside the Batcave
rooms.Description:
You are fascinated by the complex computers inside this dark cavern.  This is
the information center where Batman gets his info from the universal
database.  He can check the backgrounds of anyone from anywhere around the
world.  As you walk further inside this secret hideout, you'll notice a glass
display case.  Inside that case, the Batman keeps his extra suit just in case
his old one got soiled.  Just when you thought you're alone in here, you hear
a sound coming from the west of here...  It's probably the Batman discussing
his strategies with his sidekick, Robin!

Exits.Description:
This exit will get you out of the Batcave and back into the secret
passageway!

rooms.Name: Inside the Batcave
rooms.Description:
Holy Asparagus!  Batman and Robin are standing in the same room together
discussing on how they would recapture the Joker.  They're attention seems to
be focused on their planning and they don't seem to notice you've sneaked
inside their hideout.  You are in awe to see the great detective and his
pupil at work as they try to solve the whereabouts of the fugitive. Each clue
they have seems to be dissected carefully and examined thoroughly so that
nothing escapes them from solving this case.  To the south of here, you'll
notice a steel door...you wonder to yourself, what's behind it...

Exits.Description:
An impenetrable, titanium door is standing before you.  It looks like it's
locked tight!

rooms.Name: An Unescapable Titanium Holding Cell
rooms.Description:
From wall to wall, this room is covered in super-hard titanium alloy.  This
is the room where Batman keeps the most harden criminals instead of placing
them in state penitentiary or even Arkham Asylum.  Batman knows that if these
criminals were to ever escape...there would be mass killings all around
Gotham!  But the criminals don't seem to be interested to getting out at this
moment.  Their attention seems to be focused on you...you're in deep manure,
son!

Exits.Description: This is your only exit out of this room...looks like you better use it!

rooms.Name: Metro-Gotham Main Street
rooms.Description:
There's no city on Earth that can compared to the grand city of Metro-
Gotham.  Everywhere you look, there seems to be something that you've never
seen before.  Like those anti-gravity automobiles or those spectacular 'sky
projection' commercial billboards.  Everything in this city is just amazing
and you can't wait to see more during your tour of this place.  To the west
of here, there's an intersecting road.

rooms.Name: Luthor's Boulevard
rooms.Description:
This road stretches all the way west of here and it doesn't look like it'll
end in the next mile or so.  You can see the tourists here walking along this
road, probably wanting to visit a historical landmark somewhere along there.
You are tempted to walk with them and see what's there but you know it'll be
a long walk before you'll reach the end.

rooms.Name: Luthor's Boulevard
rooms.Description:
You're getting tired after this long walk and you don't seem to be getting
anywhere.  The other tourists walking beside you look as though they're
determined to find the landmark at the end of this street.  You wonder if
it's really worth it to walk these long miles just to take some pictures. Who
knows?...  Maybe you'll get to meet a super-celebrity at the end of your long
walk.

rooms.Name: Luthor's Boulevard
rooms.Description:
This look like the end of the road but it actually curves toward the
northwest of here.  To the south, however, there's a road that'll take you to
somewhere else...most of the tourists around here seem to be heading towards
there.  The northwest road doesn't seem to be popular today, all the tourists
seems to be keeping their distance from that direction.  Maybe you should
take the south road if you know what's good for you.

rooms.Name: Hero Street
rooms.Description:
This broad road looks pretty short and you can see from a distance where it
would take you.  There's a large dome structure to the southwest and that's
where all the tourists from around here seem to be headed.  The monolithic
structure looks like some museum or a government office.

rooms.Name: Hero Street
rooms.Description:
The short, broad road ends here and you're standing before a huge foundation.
The front of this structure has words that read 'Justice League of America.'
Sounds like this is some sort of a court house but judging from the tourists'
fanatic expressions, this structure has got to be something more than just
that.  There are huge doors that separate the large crowd from the insides of
this huge complex.  The doors are to the west of here, but you don't need to
know that because you're staying outside like the other tourists here.

Exits.Description:
These doors will take you inside the Justice League of America's
Headquarters.

rooms.Name: Inside the Justice League of America's Headquarters
rooms.Description:
The insides of this complex is just fascinating.  Like any government
foundation, this building is huge and looks very well-maintained.  There are
large marble pillars here holding this structure together.  The architecture
of this magnificent building are similar to ancient Roman office houses both
from the outside and the inside.  To the west, you see a hallway that'll take
you to the separate rooms of this building.

Exits.Description: This exit will take you back outside of the Justice League Headquarters.

rooms.Name: The Hallway Inside the Justice League of America's Headquarters
rooms.Description:
As you walk down this hallway, you'll notice tall statues on each side of the
aisle.  Those statues are the likeness of each member of the Justice League.
The craftmanship of each sculpture is exquisite and you just wish you have
you camera at this moment so you can take some great snapshots. This hallway
continues to the south of here.

rooms.Name: The Hallway Inside the Justice League of America's Headquarters
rooms.Description:
This short corridor seems to stop here.  To the west of here, you'll notice a
large meeting room of some sort.  It looks like a meeting room where the
members of the Justice League discuss their strategies on their targetted
villains.  As you sneak-a-peek further inside this large room, you'll also
notice that some of the Justice League members are standing inside at this
very moment!

rooms.Name: The Justice League of America's Meeting Room
rooms.Description:
This looks to be the largest room inside this mammoth structure and it's no
wonder that this is the most important room here.  All the Justice League
members are required to meet inside this room so that they can discuss
matters at hand.  Usually, it's Superman or Batman who would organize the
group and make sure that everyone knows their priorities.  There's a large
table in the middle of this room and there are twelve seats that surround it.
On the wall in front of you, there's a giant main viewer where the members
can see satellite images of what's happening around the world.  To the north
of where you're standing, you'll notice a thick steel door that seems to be
locked.

Exits.Description: Something important must be behind this impenetrable steel door!

rooms.Name: The Brig Inside the Justice League of America's Headquarters
rooms.Description:
The walls inside this unescapable prison are made of the purest of the purest
vibranium and there's nothing that the criminals in here can do to escape
this prison cell.  The Justice League of America has captured these prisoners
and placed them inside this prison so that they can watch them twenty-four
hours a day. These criminals are some of the Justice League's  most dangerous
foes and if they were to ever be released, they could spread panic and
destuction to the public.

Exits.Description: This door will take you back outside to the Justice League headquarters!

rooms.Name: Luthor's Boulevard
rooms.Description:
This looks to be the end of this street and there doesn't seem to be anyone
around.  All the tourists here know this is a bad place to be in and they're
smart to be avoiding here.  To the west, there are large doors that'll take
you to the insides of a large white complex.  The large engravings on the
front of this building reads 'Injustice League of America.'  You are curious
to know who's operating inside this structure ... could it be an
anti-government organization or maybe it could be a haven for criminals?

Exits.Description: Behind these doors, you'll find the Injustice League of America's HQ.

rooms.Name: Inside the Justice League of America's Headquarters
rooms.Description:
You are now inside this mammoth complex and there doesn't seem to be anything
here that looks anything out of the ordinary.  This building looks pretty
deserted but you can't be sure because of the lighting inside is so dim that
you're forced to walk in a slow pace.  To the west, there's a hallway that'll
take you to the surrounding rooms.

Exits.Description: These doors will lead back to the outsides of this building.

rooms.Name: The Hallway Inside the Injustice League of America's Headquarters
rooms.Description:
This corridor looks broad and short.  The lighting here is still as bad as
the rest of this place.  As you walk further inside this hallway, you notice
cockroaches and diseased rodents crawling around your feet.  You want to get
out of this place quickly but your curiousity gets the better of you.
There's a room to the north of here.

rooms.Name: The Hallway Inside the Injustice League of America's Headquarters
rooms.Description:
The dark corridor ends here and to the north, there's a large meeting room.
You can see from a distance that this room is very well-lit but still a
little dim for your taste.  As you get closer, trying to peek inside this
room, you can hear faint whispers.  The shadowry occupants of this building
are discussing matters that sound like it involves the superheroes in this
city...curiouser and curiouser...

rooms.Name: The Injustice League of America's Meeting Room
rooms.Description:
This is the largest room in this entire building and what you see inside this
room will shock you forever.  There are about a dozen supervillains here
sitting at a long meeting table.  Don't worry about introducing yourself,
they'll get that information from you as soon as they take you to their
torture chamber and interrogate you.  You gasp in fear as these super-powered
madmen/madwomen starts coming closer and closer to you.  They look ready to
rip your heart out if you try resisting them.  There's nowhere to run...your
back is against the wall!  They're about to strike and you have no idea what
to do...except to give up!

rooms.Name: The House of Pain
rooms.Description:
As you walk inside this dark room, you'll notice you're walking on a sticky
red liquid.  As you look closer to the ground, you notice this room is soaked
in blood!  This is the torture chamber where the Injustice League members
take their victims and force them to give out valuable information. Though
this room is as dark as night, you can see the many instruments of pain that
these evil monsters use to hurt their prisoners.  You are disgusted as you
head out of this room in a hurry.

rooms.Name: Metro-Gotham Main Street
rooms.Description:
This popular road looks so lively as you walk along its broad sidewalks. All
around you, there seems to be flashing billboards and neon signs that make
this city look so glamourous.  There are shops all over this long stretch of
road and you can see the vacationers here just walking in and out buying all
sorts of goods.  This long road continues north and south of where you're
standing.

rooms.Name: Metro-Gotham Main Street
rooms.Description:
You are enjoying this long walk just watching the tourists here in a shopping
frenzy.  There are also amazing spectacles all around you like those street
mime performers. Even though you want to explore more of this incredible
city, you're getting tired from the walking.  There are anti-gravity tourist
trains around here but you know it'll probably be crowded.  The road
continues north and south.

rooms.Name: Metro-Gotham Main Street
rooms.Description:
This looks to be the end of this street but actually it continues to the
northeast of here.  This popular road curves into that direction and who
knows where it will take you.  The tourists here seem to be headed to that
direction so you know that place is probably not dangerous.  To the west,
there's another road that'll take you elsewhere.

rooms.Name: Silver Age Avenue
rooms.Description:
This road looks pretty deserted except for maybe one or two tourists who lost
their way.  You don't sense anything dangerous around here, maybe a mugger or
two but no one that can really hurt you.  The street looks pretty tidy, there
are a few scraps of paper on the ground but otherwise it's very well
maintained. The shops around here aren't as spectacular as the ones on Main
Street but it serves its purpose for the local residents. The road continues
west of here.

rooms.Name: Silver Age Avenue
rooms.Description:
You could get bored just living around this neighborhood.  Everyone seems to
be staying indoors unlike the social crowd on Main Street.  As you walk
further down this road, you'll notice a tall building shaped like a 'T' from
a distance, north of here.  What a strange-looking building, you think to
yourself.  This road continues west of here.

rooms.Name: Silver Age Avenue
rooms.Description:
You're standing before a very large building that's shaped like a 'T.'  It
looks like it's made out of glass and steel.  You're dying to check what's
inside this tall building and study its unusual architecture design.  There's
a glass door to the north and it seems to be locked tight.  You have no way
of getting inside this grand structure without an access card that unlocks
the security keypad.

Exits.Description: This door will take you inside this tall building shaped like a 'T.' ;)

rooms.Name: Inside the Titan's Tower
rooms.Description:
You're amazed, bedazzled, and shocked by the incredible beauty of this lavish
building.  You wonder who could be living inside this amazing glass castle
with such wealth and taste.  To the north of here, you'll notice a small
pathway that'll take you to a glass elevator.  That elevator would take you
to the upper floors of this grand palace.

Exits.Description: This door will take you back to the streets where you came from.

rooms.Name: The Security Desk at the Titan's Tower
rooms.Description:
As soon as you walk into this room, a security guard jumps up from his seat
and shouts at you to halt.  He doesn't look too friendly and he doesn't look
like he's going to do you any favors.  The elevator looks to be locked tight
and the only way you can get inside is to get the key from this husky guard.

Exits.Description:
This is the entrance to the elevator.  It'll take you to the upper floors of
this grand building.

rooms.Name: Going Up the Elevator at the Titan's Tower
rooms.Description:
This wide glass elevator is just magnificent.  You could go up and down
inside this elevator all day just to check out the outdoor view.  You'll
notice this elevator doesn't seem to be stopping any time soon as it heads
directly upwards to the main suite of this building.

Exits.Description: The Main Floor of this building is located downwards of here.

rooms.Name: Inside the Main Suite of the Titan's Tower
rooms.Description:
You are in awe to see such a lovely decorated room.  The floor is covered in
white marble tiles and the walls are plastered with pastel-colored paint.
This spacious room is very well-lit and the sunroof is providing most of the
warmth that makes this room so cozy.  There's a large screen projection
television located in the middle of the room with leathery couches
surrounding it.  This room makes you feel as though you're home at this very
moment.  To the east and west, you can see there are rooms connecting to this
one.

rooms.Name: The Mess Hall Inside the Titan's Tower
rooms.Description:
This looks to be where the occupants of this building dine and socialize with
one another.  There are tables here set up so that they can watch the indoor
view while enjoying a light snack.  The bar is located just next to you where
they can select from various types of drinks.  The large fridge just in front
of you seems to be packed with food and there's a hot chef stove ready to
cook a hearty meal.

rooms.Name: The Teen Titan's Meeting Room
rooms.Description:
As you walk inside this room, you'll notice that there are large computers
from wall to wall.  This looks like a meeting room of some sort.  There's a
large table in the center of the room and there are about a dozen chairs
surrounding it.  There's a large view screen in front of the meeting table
where occupants can watch during a discussion.  To the north, there's a force
field of some sort that blocks you from going to that direction.  It looks
impenetrable and the only way to open it is to get a security combo.

Exits.Description:
You'll have to unlock 'One' in order to open this forcefield.  Behind this
barrier, you can see another forcefield there...waiting to stop you!

rooms.Name: Area Restricted: DANGER (Gate One)
rooms.Description:
Just as the sign reads, this place is dangerous to your health.  If you try
advancing any further, you would not only be endangering your life but the
world as well!  You don't know what's behind this forcefield or the force-
field after that...you only know that there's something down this corridor
that's so POWERFUL...so EVIL...that even the world's greatest superheroes
would not be able to contain it!  Another powerful forcefield is located
north of here.

Exits.Description: You will have to unlock 'TWO' in order to get this forcefield to open.
This is the exit back to the Titan's meeting room!

rooms.Name: Area Restricted: DANGER (Gate Two)
rooms.Description:
This section of the corridor is as empty as the one you came from.  The only
thing that blocks you from moving further north is another strong forcefield.
This restricted corridor looks like it may take some time before anyone can
reach the end.  The different combos that are required to open each
forcefield is beginning to confuse you.  The strategy of the Teen Titans is
working pretty well...instead of one member having all the keys, they would
spread them all out to its members, that way the intruder would give up
instead of trying to go any further.

Exits.Description: To open this forcefield, you'll have to unlock 'THREE.'
This exit will take you back outside this corridor.

rooms.Name: Area Restricted: DANGER (Gate Three)
rooms.Description:
Your heart is pounding as you come closer and closer to the secret that lies
beyond these forcefields.  But unless you have the combos that are needed to
open each and every forcefield, there's no way you'll know what's at the end
of this hall.  Another forcefield is located to the north of you and again,
it will require a combo to unlock it.

Exits.Description: To access this forcefield, you'll have to unlock 'FOUR.'
This exit will take you back to the Titan's Meeting Room.

rooms.Name: Area Restricted: DANGER (Gate Four)
rooms.Description:
This is becoming tedious.  Another forcefield has been erected to the north
of you.  The Teen Titans are really trying hard not to let anyone pass
through that steel door at the end of this hall.  You're beginning to tire
from having to just search for each individual combos and trying to find
which key would access which forcefield.  Maybe you're better off not knowing
what's the TERROR behind that steel door.

Exits.Description: You'll need to open 'FIVE' in order to open this forcefield.
This exit will take you back to the Titan's Meeting Room.

rooms.Name: Area Restricted: DANGER (Gate Five)
rooms.Description:
Again another invisible forcefield blocks your way from going any further.
You wonder how many forcefields are there all together in this heavily
secured area.  From behind this invisible shield you'll notice a strange
figure standing in front of the steel door.  She's wearing a dark cloak
around her body and you notice a light aura around her that tells you she is
no ordinary being...

Exits.Description:
You have to open 'SIX' to pass through this forcefield and to that steel door
at the end of this corridor.
This exit will take you back to the insides of the Titan's Tower.

rooms.Name: Area Restricted: DANGER (Gate Six)
rooms.Description:
Finally, you have come to the end of this long corridor after unlocking every
forcefields imaginable.  There's a steel door to the north and it seems to be
glowing as though it is enchanted by magic.  But you are more curious about
the strange cloaked woman that's standing in front of this door.  She seems
to be the protector of this entrance and you have a feeling that she'll go
all out to stop you from reaching within. There's a large sign here posted at
the door and it looks important.

Exits.Description:
This steel door looks like it is protected by magic.  Only a key made of
magic unlock this mighty barrier. But WATCH OUT!  Passing through this door
is dangerous for your health!
This exit will take you back to the Titan's Meeting Room.

ExtraDescs.Description:
"...whoever shall open this door would open the pathway for the Devil to find
his way into the mortal realm.  The day this door would open is the day
apocalypse would consume the Earth..."

rooms.Name: Inside the Dark Dimension...Gasp!
rooms.Description:
Everywhere you look, you see nothing, you feel nothing, and you hear nothing.
You're just drifting inside this 'nothingness' and there doesn't seem to be
anywhere you can go to.  The door from which you have entered from seems to
be still opened.  Maybe it would be wise if you go back before you get
trapped inside this strange place.  As you reach for the door, you notice a
new doorway is opening before your very eyes.  A magical portal appears in
just seconds and you seem to be drawn to it as though someone or something is
summoning you...

Exits.Description: This exit will take you back to the corridor which you came.

rooms.Name: The Lair of the Fallen Angel
rooms.Description:
As you walk inside this room, the smell of brimstone becomes overwhelming.
This room is not so well-lit but you can see the silhouettes of soldiers
standing beside a larger being, possibly the leader of the pack.  The giant
is way too big to be anything human and the reindeer horns growing from his
