head makes him look like the Devil himself.  His eyes are glowing red and he
seems to be grinning as though you've done a favor for him...

rooms.Name: Metro-Gotham Main Street
rooms.Description:
There are still a lot of tourists here heading to your northeast.  They're
riding on bikes and some even on horses as they head off to who knows where
this street will end.  The shops here look very prosperous and even the
hot-dog stands seem like they're rolling in the big bucks.  As you walk
further northeast of here, you'll notice more and more trees are planted
here.  There are shrubbery and flower gardens everywhere you look.  There has
to be a park somewhere around this vicinity.

rooms.Name: Metro-Gotham Main Street
rooms.Description:
As you walk further and further northeast of here, you can smell the pine and
the freshly cutted grass ... the sweet scent of a spring-time garden
potpourri.  Now you are surrounded by lush green bushes as well as tall oak
trees.  You can hear the birds chirping and singing about your head as you
continue your journey down this main road.

rooms.Name: Metro-Gotham Main Street
rooms.Description:
This looks to be the end of the long stretch of road and it ends at the
entrance of the city park.  The tourists beside you are jumping with joy as
they rush to the entrance to nab a good spot for their picnic.  From a
distance inside this park, you can see the happy kids there playing with
their frisbees or flying kites.  Meanwhile the adults there are cooling
themselves under the comfort of a shady tree.  You could use a good nap
yourself under one of those trees.

rooms.Name: Entrance to Metro-Gotham Central Park
rooms.Description:
You arrive at the entrance of Metro-Gotham's Central Park, the largest park
in the world.  Every year, there are more than a million tourists who come
here for relaxation and some fun with the kids.  The children here are
running back and forth throwing frisbees to one another and others are riding
on bikes and skating on roller blades.  Everyone seems to be enjoying
themselves on this nice sunny day.

rooms.Name: Inside the Metro-Gotham Central Park
rooms.Description:
Everywhere you look there are people all over the fairground.  You can smell
the delicious hamburgers and the hot-dogs cooking on the grills.  The picnic
tables have all been taken and all the families there are enjoying their
meals. As you walk further inside this park, you'll notice the narrow
cemented pathways that'll take you to different directions.

rooms.Name: Inside the Metro-Gotham Central Park
rooms.Description:
The smell of lush green plants and trees make you feel peaceful as though
you're one with nature.  The canopy made by the surrounding trees are so cool
that you feel like taking a nap.  The cemented pathway continues to the north
and east of here.

rooms.Name: Inside the Metro-Gotham Central Park
rooms.Description:
A person could easily get lost around this vast park.  There are no signs
here that point to which direction a person should take to get back to the
entrance.  Who knows what could be lurking around this area...in the shady
parts of the heavily wooded area?  There could be bears or even mountain
lions hunting for their dinner...or there might even be a gang of young thugs
here looking for some 'action.'

rooms.Name: Inside the Metro-Gotham Central Park
rooms.Description:
Most of the tourists around here seem to be staying close to the entrance.
You wonder why they don't set their picnic spot around here where the grass
is greener and fresher.  Maybe it's because of the lack of security in this
park since gang members have been reported to attack any tourists they came
across.  The overhead lights and the hidden security cameras don't do a whole
lot to solve this problem.

rooms.Name: Inside the Metro-Gotham Central Park
rooms.Description:
The landscape of this park looks so natural and the small river stream that
runs down a nearby rocky slope looks so fresh and clean.  The serenity of
this magnificent park gives you the feeling of peace and tranquility.  As you
walk further deeper in this park, you'll notice a pathway to the southeast
that'll take you to a deep, dark wooded area.  That area is so dark that you
get the feeling that something is lurking inside...

rooms.Name: Inside the Metro-Gotham Central Park
rooms.Description:
It seems the farther you get from the park entrance, your sense of direction
gets more confused.  The narrow cemented pathways that were suppose to guide you
all around this vast park look more like a maze of madness.  If you don't try
turning back now...it seems you'll be lost here forever.

rooms.Name: Inside the Metro-Gotham Central Park
rooms.Description:
This park is huge and you are beginning to lose your way around here.  If it
gets any darker, who knows what will be coming out from hiding.  Maybe a gang
of young hoodlums or even wild animals could be stalking you at this very
moment...waiting and waiting for sunset...  To the west, you'll notice a
brilliant light is flashing there.  The light is so intense that when you
look directly at it, it'll blind you in an instant.

rooms.Name: Inside the Metro-Gotham Central Park
rooms.Description:
You are blinded by a radiant light as soon as you step into this wooded area.
You try shielding your eyes with your hands but you can barely make out a
blurred image.  The brilliant light seems to be dying down as your eyes
become adjusting back to normal lighting.  As you look for the object that
was making the brilliant glow, you notice it's not an object after all but a
superbeing...  He seems to be in pain as he cries out for help.  The
illuminating aura around this fascinating creature is beginning to go dimmer
and dimmer...

rooms.Name: A Deep, Dark Wooded Area
rooms.Description:
You heart is thumping faster than you're moving inside this dark wooded area.
All around you, there are glowing eyes watching your every movement as you
struggle to get back into a clearing.  You shriek in fear as some furry
creature rubs across your legs.  From a distance, you can hear the sound of
an animal panting...it seems to be getting closer by the minute.

rooms.Name: A Deep, Dark Wooded Area
rooms.Description:
It only gets darker and darker as you move deeper and deeper into this
heavily wooded area.  The thick canopy shields out any sunlight that could
help you find your way around here.  You bump from one tree to another and
you trip on tree roots and vines as you struggle to move as quickly as
possible through the thick woods.

rooms.Name: A Deep, Dark Wooded Area
rooms.Description:
It only gets darker and darker as you move deeper and deeper into this
heavily wooded area.  The thick canopy shields out any sunlight that could
help you find your way around here.  You bump from one tree to another and
you trip on tree roots and vines as you struggle to move as quickly as
possible through these thick woods.

Exits.Description: You spy some bright lights in the sky.

rooms.Name: A Deep, Dark Wooded Area
rooms.Description:
It only gets darker and darker as you move deeper and deeper into this
heavily wooded area.  The thick canopy shields out any sunlight that could
help you find your way around here.  You bump from one tree to another and
you trip on tree roots and vines as you struggle to move as quickly as
possible through the thick woods.

rooms.Name: A Deep, Dark Wooded Area
rooms.Description:
You get the feeling that you're going in circles but you don't seem to care.
All you know is that you must keep on moving otherwise something, something
big and ferocious, would catch up to you and rip you to shreds. As you
struggle to pass through the many obstacles in this area, you notice a
clearing to the northeast.

rooms.Name: The Entrance to the Castle of the Endless
rooms.Description:
You're standing before the largest castle you've ever seen.  Amazingly it
looks very well-maintained as though it was built just yesterday.  The
drawbridge is just east of here and it looks like it's locked.  The moat of
this castle seems to be inhabited by some serpentine creatures so there's no
way you can get inside without having to open the wooden drawbridge.  As
darkness begins to fall, you know it's time to run before the creatures of
the night catches up to you...

Exits.Description:
Only with a certain magic wand could you get this mystical drawbridge to open
for you!

rooms.Name: Inside the Castle of the Endless
rooms.Description:
This castle is beautifully furnished and looks very tidy.  On one side of the
wall there is a gallery of old paintings.  There are six paintings in all,
portaits of white-fleshed beings sitting emotionless.  The paintings look
very spooky as the stone-cold eyes of these portrait models seem to be
watching your every movement.  A hallway is located north of here.

Exits.Description: This exit will take you back outside into the deep wooded area.

rooms.Name: The Hallway Inside the Castle of the Endless
rooms.Description:
Even though this place looks very well decorated and well-maintained, you
still think there's something strange about this castle.  You sense that this
castle is more that what it seems, that it's 'unreal,' almost like a dream.
You don't understand why you would think that...but something in your head
tells you that you're not fully conscious about your surroundings. The idea
that everything in here are figments of your dream is beginning to confuse
you, the only way to escape this madness is to walk out of here.

rooms.Name: The Hallway Inside the Castle of the Endless
rooms.Description:
You are now certain that all this is coming from your dreams but you don't
know how or why you are being 'summoned' here.  All you know is that you
must walk to the room to your west and meet the powerful beings who brought
you here.  As you walk further west of here, you'll notice a wall has
suddenly appeared to the east so that you can't exit out of here without
first meeting the occupants of this dream castle.

rooms.Name: The Room of the Gathering
rooms.Description:
Everything inside this room looks so blurry, so unreal.  In a dream, nothing
is clear in the unconscious mind.  The only figures you can make out are the
six mysterious beings sitting around an octagon-shaped table. They don't seem
to be moving their lips as they try to communicate with you...but your mind
is not focused enough to understand their words.  You become confused and you
want to get out of here.  The only way out of this castle seems to be that
door north of here.

Exits.Description: This is the only exit out of this room.  Use it wisely...

rooms.Name: A Deep, Dark Wooded Area
rooms.Description:
It only gets darker and darker as you move deeper and deeper into this
heavily wooded area.  The thick canopy shields out any sunlight that could
help you find your way around here.  You bump from one tree to another and
you trip on tree roots and vines as you struggle to move as quickly as
possible through the thick woods.

rooms.Name: Inside the Daily Planet
rooms.Description:
As you step inside this historical building, you'll notice the workers here
are scrambling back and forth trying to meet the deadline.  You can hear the
typewriters and the shoutings from the halls as the reporters and writers are
all going crazy trying to complete their tasks.  As you move further inside
this massive structure, you can see a marble staircase that'll take you to
the upperfloors.

Exits.Description: This revolving door will take you outside the Daily Planet.

rooms.Name: Inside the Daily Planet
rooms.Description:
You've reached the second floor of this building after climbing that long
staircase.  This floor is no different from the previous floor you came from.
Workers here are still scrambling to get their work done before the end of
the day.

rooms.Name: Inside the Daily Planet
rooms.Description:
This floor doesn't seem to be as crowded as the previous floors you came
from.  You can guess that this must be the floor where the management staff
has their offices set up.  There's a man here, standing in the distance and
smoking a cigar.  He looks pretty important...he must be the chief editor of
the Daily Planet...

rooms.Name: Walking along a curved section of Golden Age Avenue
rooms.Description:
The scenaries along this section of the road are just magnificent.  The fresh
sea breeze and the sound of sea gulls on the beach make you just wish you can
live around this neighborhood.  This curved section of the road seems to take
you further along the shoreline.

rooms.Name: Walking on Golden Age Avenue
rooms.Description:
You can never get tired of walking along this beautiful roadway.  The
picturesque landscapes are so natural and the vast sea that spans as far as
the eye can see is just breathtaking.  You'll notice you're coming close to
the end of this long road.  It seems to end close to that large mansion from
a distance, east of here.

rooms.Name: End of Golden Age Avenue
rooms.Description:
This long stretch of road ends here and you're not surprise where it took
you.  You're standing before a driveway garden of one of the richest men on
the planet...Bruce Wayne.  Yes, Bruce Wayne, the billionaire playboy-
philanthropist lives inside this huge mansion.  The driveway garden that's
structured in front of the mansion is just lovely.  You're tempted to walk
around this estate to examine the Victorian-style mansion and maybe even
catch a glimpse of the popular Mr. Wayne through the windows.
